name: Nuclear Regulatory Commission v. Texas
question:
1. Can a nonparty challenge a federal agency’s “final order” under the Hobbs Act’s judicial review provision? 

2. Do federal nuclear laws allow the Nuclear Regulatory Commission to license private companies to store spent nuclear fuel at off-reactor sites?
description: A case in which the Court will decide whether a nonparty can challenge a federal agency’s “final order” under the Hobbs Act’s judicial review provision; and whether federal nuclear laws allow the Nuclear Regulatory Commission to license private companies to store spent nuclear fuel at off-reactor sites.
